title: Pixel 4 XL Assistant font extremely blurry when using dark theme
content:
The font for the Google assistant is extremely blurry when using the system wide dark theme. The problem only occurs in assistant responses or the assistant settings. Any other text displays normally. It also seems to be independent of font size or screen size settings. When using the light theme, everything displays normally.

Looks like this:
category: Google Assistant and Voice Actions, Google Pixel 4 XL
